thread.title: BRIEF-Veeva Sees FY 2019 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.30 To $1.33

title: BRIEF-Veeva Sees FY 2019 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.30 To $1.33
text: February 27, 2018 / 9:34 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Veeva Sees FY 2019 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.30 To $1.33 Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Veeva Systems Inc: * VEEVA ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2018 RESULTS * SEES Q1 2019 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.30 TO $0.31 * SEES FY 2019 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.30 TO $1.33 * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.23 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.22 * SEES FY 2019 REVENUE $815 MILLION TO $820 MILLION * SEES Q1 2019 REVENUE $188 MILLION TO $189 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 23 PERCENT TO $184.9 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.21, REVENUE VIEW $180.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.02, REVENUE VIEW $806.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
